description.original: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling
description.translation: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling

dict..setDesc('When enabled, all nodes on the: .setDesc('启用后，Obsidian画布上的所有节点也可以使用修改键进行调整大小。')
dict..setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed d: .setDesc('鼠标滚轮缩放需要按下的键。')
dict..setDesc('Step value by which the size o: .setDesc('图像大小增加/减少的步长值。')
dict..setDesc('Initial image size if no size: .setDesc('如果没有定义尺寸，则为初始图像尺寸。')
